Package XML_Learn

Class Main

java.lang.Object
XML_Learn.Main
public class Main extends Object
The XML_Learn Package Contains the Main Class.It has the main method of the Application.
Version:
0.1
Author:
Manimaran Gv

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws ParserConfigurationException, IOException, SAXException
      String[] args means an array of sequence of characters (Strings) that are passed to the "main" function. This happens when a program is executed.
      Parameters:
      args - In the main() method also accepts some data from the user.It accepts a group of string,which is called a string array.It is used to hold the comment line arguments in the form of string values.
      Throws:
      ParserConfigurationException - Indicates a serious configuration error.
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
      SAXException - Encapsulate a general SAX error or warning.

    • FindNode

      public static void FindNode(Document doc, String File_Name) throws IOException
      In this Method the Urls Elements retrived from the Document doc.Then it is Proceed to Extract the All Url Elements From the Urls ELement With Method type and Operation type of that Url Element.Then It is Passed to the Execute Method.
      Parameters:
      doc - It is the Parsed Document that has tree Structured XML ELements.
      File_Name - It is Name of the Input File.
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.

    • UrlsExecution

      public static void UrlsExecution(Node UrlsNode, String method_value, String operation_type, String File_Name, String prefix_Name) throws IOException
      If the Urls Element has the Common method and Operation type then the UrlsExecution method will Start to Execute the Remaining Programs.
      Parameters:
      UrlsNode - It is the Node that has the Url Elements
      method_value - It is the String Data type That Contains the method Attribute value.
      operation_type - It is the String Data type That Contains the Operation type Attribute value.
      File_Name - It is Name of the Input File.
      prefix_Name - it is the String Data type That Contains the urlpath prefix Name.
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.

    • Execute

      public static void Execute(Node UrlNode, String method_value, String operation_type, String File_Name, String prefix_Name) throws IOException
      The Execute Method will check the User Conditions, Change the null string to "" .Call the Write_Task2_Data method that the XML Attribute and Element data into the .tsv file.
      Parameters:
      UrlNode - It is the Node that has the Url Elements
      method_value - It is the String Data type That Contains the method Attribute value.
      operation_type - It is the String Data type That Contains the Operation type Attribute value.
      File_Name - It is Name of the Input File.
      prefix_Name - it is the String Data type That Contains the urlpath prefix Name.
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
